title: The Hostage Bargain
description: “I'm hopelessly addicted. I don’t even care. I love these guys.” ~GoodreadsMy cruel banker boss had the whole town under his thumb, but nobody more than me.I was miserable.Trapped.Until the three hot AF outlaws came to town.They robbed my boss’s bank like it was child’s play.They took me hostage.But the truth is, they rescued me.And now they’re obsessed with protecting me, like I’m their new Cinderella.But can this four-way fairytale have a happy ending?
author: Annika Martin
